data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 114,253 believers in Quintana Roo against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quintana Roo, Mexico

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 114,253 believers in Quintana Roo and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,090,300 citizens of Quintana Roo, Mexico, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 114,253 believers in Quintana Roo, Mexico a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Make the Jew, Spanish-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, guide seekers in Quintana Roo, Mexico to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Quintana Roo, Mexico.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Quintana Roo, Mexico has a population of 1,090,300.

We estimate Quintana Roo has 114,253 people who might know Jesus, 924,867 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 51,181 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Quintana Roo, Mexico to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
